title: Deutsche Bank scoops top spot as best trade finance provider globally
body:
For the third time running, Euromoney has selected Deutsche Bank “Best Global Trade Finance Provider” in the Euromoney Trade Finance Survey 2017. The Bank received a total of 17 number one wins, including No.1 trade finance provider in Germany, North America, Asia Pacific and China.
“These are impressive accolades for our business demonstrate that we continue to provide best-in-class products and services for our clients within all the major regions that we operate. Trade finance is the lifeblood of trade and a factor for growth and development,” said Deutsche Bank’s Michael Spiegel, global head of trade finance and cash management corporates.
Awards overview

Global: No.1 (3rd time running)
North America: No.1 (3rd time running)
Asia Pacific: No.1 (3rd time running)

Spain: No.1 (2nd time running)

Brazil: No.1 (2nd time running)

Hong Kong: No.1 (2nd time running)
